item.title: Watchlist - Mobile app to monitor hosts and VMS in vSphere
item.description: Whilst searching around I spotted an app is never used from VMware in the Play store. It’s called Watchlist and it gives you simple monitoring and visibility of selected Hosts and VMs that you choose from your standalone host or vCenter instance. You can easily view their statuses: And see the console of a VM, see what resources it is using and also stop/start/reset it. I just restarted one of my virtual hosts and watched it boot in the console.
